title: Crashed 3 times in a game
body: the game crashed 3 times while playing. Each time right before the team fight or during.

replies.body: Damn, that must be pretty frustrating to leave the game just before a fight starts.  :/  I want to help but I still need some more info.  What do you mean exaCtly by crash?  Are there any error messages?  What are you seeing exactly?  Let me know!
